channel.title: MVG on Haozheng Lin
channel.description: Recent content in MVG on Haozheng Lin

item.title: [After Work] ESP8266 based information terminal
item.description: Abstract I’ve already built a smart home system based on Home Assistant. The most important task is showing the states of both bathrooms‘ doors sensors because I don’t want to physically check them just like checking other dudes' excretion duration… And sometimes is just too lazy to take out the phone and check the next bus to the city center, or just too lazy to check the real feel temperature.
